snippet: Some students expressed disappointment that the president will be speaking at the sibling school of his alma mater.
abstract: Tensions have arisen between Columbia University and Barnard College, its sister university, over Pres Barack Obama's decision to give commencement speech at Barnard and not Columbia, his alma mater.
lead_paragraph: Some students expressed disappointment that the president will be speaking at the sibling school of his alma mater.

headline.seo: With Obama to Speak at Barnard, Strong Emotions at Columbia
headline.main: After Barnard Gets Obama for Speech, Tensions With Columbia Bubble Up
headline.print_headline: After Barnard Gets Obama for Speech, Tensions With Columbia Bubble Up
